ingredients: 1 cup Nestlé® Toll House® Dark Chocolate Morsels
2½ gelatin sheets or 2½ teaspoons powdered gelatin or 1 (.25 oz ) unflavored gelatin packet
2½ gelatin sheets or 2½ teaspoons powdered gelatin or 1 (.25 oz ) unflavored gelatin packet
1 carton (6 ounces) fresh raspberries, pureed & strained
